actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation with amendment, H. Rept. 96-914.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 2080 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959, to authorize the Administrator of General Services to issue obligations for the construction and acquisition of public buildings, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Public Buildings Act of 1959 to authorize the Administrator of General Services to issue obligations for purchase by the Secretary of the Treasury, to the extent authorized in appropriation Acts, for financing the acquisition or construction of any public buildings. Directs that the average market yield on outstanding marketable U.S. obligations be taken into consideration in determining the interest for such obligations. Requires approval by the appropriate congressional committees of such acquisition or construction. Makes this Act effective October 1, 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959, to authorize the Administrator of General Services to issue obligations for the construction and acquisition of public buildings, and for other purposes.
